entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 6:54 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. High minus 8.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:54 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023
